price: 2. Usuk Yallay sin gine kinni, korostay yallih inkittinaane yangadde siinik yaniih, moomintuy kaa nummaysay kay diinil taamita siinik yanih, Yalli isin abba haytaanam yabali kinniih tu kaak ma qellittaay sin elle gälte le.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُمۡ فَمِنكُمۡ كَافِرٞ وَمِنكُم مُّؤۡمِنٞۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī khalaqakum faminkum kāfirun waminkum mu'minun wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
